title: Russian reporter, lawyer beaten in Chechnya ahead of high-profile trial
description: The journalist, Yelena Milashina, and the lawyer, Alexander Nemov, were on their way to attend the trial of Zarema Musayeva, the mother of exiled opposition activists.

title: Zelensky: Georgia should send ex-leader to Ukraine after alarming video
description: Footage showed the pro-West former president of Georgia, Mikheil Saakashvili, looking emaciated while imprisoned on charges he denies.

title: Israeli incursion into Jenin enters second day seeking more targets
description: The Israeli military expected clashes to continue throughout the day but signaled that the operation may be nearing its end.

title: Fundraiser for French officer who killed teen raises over $1.5 million
description: The GoFundMe campaign for the officer’s family received far more donations than one for the mother of Nahel M., who was shot during a traffic stop outside Paris.

title: Activists in Lebanon are fighting to reclaim dwindling public spaces
description: In Lebanon, where people are reeling from an economic crisis and desperate to breathe, open spaces are often shuttered or reserved for those who can pay.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky accuses Russia of trying to kill former Georgian president
description: Kyiv alleged that the Kremlin was using Tbilisi to kill Mikheil Saakashvili, who led Georgia during Russia’s 2008 invasion and is now a Ukrainian citizen.
